meanings.definition: The quality of being overly sentimental or cliché.
meanings.sent1: The corniness of the movie made me cringe.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stand the corniness of the love scene.
meanings.sent3: The corniness of the romantic dialogue was so predictable.
meanings.sent4: The corniness of the plot was like a bad soap opera.
meanings.sent5: The corniness of the film was so exaggerated it felt fake.

meanings.definition: A lack of originality or authenticity in a work of art or entertainment.
meanings.sent1: The corniness of the song lyrics was unbearable.
meanings.sent2: The film's corniness was evident in every scene.
meanings.sent3: The corniness of the painting made it look like a cheap imitation.
meanings.sent4: The play's corniness was like a bad copy of a famous play.
meanings.sent5: The corniness of the show was so obvious it was laughable.
